root.pub-comments: "The choice of this name should be explained, because other names (Aymara, Aru, Jaqimara) have been used. Because today the Aymara group is by far the largest, it is common practice to refer to the other languages as "dialects" of Aymara. However, the wor

child.pub-comments: Although Kawki and Aymara are more closely related genetically, Kawki and Jaqaru are now in closer contact and share some features to the exclusion of Aymara. "...la relación de las tres lenguas entre sí, con el Jaqaru y el Aymara en los dos extremos de
